description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧ 課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc. The contents of the course: factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

name.zh: 企業智能化營運實務與應用
name.en: Enterprise Information and Intelligent Enterprise Applications

description.zh: 採混成教學，透過面授了解企業，從產業、行業到組織，及資訊系統應用實務。藉由數位課程學習企業內各職能作業流程及ERP系統功能。配合上機實作及老師案例引導，強化系統運用與企業流程整合。
description.en: By mixed teaching methods, help students to learn enterprises from their industries, organizations and information system applications; Use digital learning courses to introduce tasks of roles in business and ERP system functions. Besides, online practices will be provided. With case studies guided by our instructors, students might learn how to integrate the system with actual enterprise operating procedures.

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions. Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。本課程藉由探討組織理論之內容，分析組織設計之相關因素，並討論當代組織最新的設計與發展趨勢，俾使同學結合組織設計之傳統及現代理論，利用個案討論增強理論之理解與活用，進而培養學生管理組織之能力。本課程包含下列四大要綱：第一部份：組織與組織理論基礎 ；第二部分：組織結構與設計；第三部分：網際網路環境下，當代與未來的組織設計趨勢；第四部份：組織理論個案探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to integrate the most resent thinking about organization design with classic and traditional ideas and theories. This course covers the following three major parts: Part 1: organization and organization theories Part 2: organization structure and design Part 3: new thinking of organization design in the Internet era, Part IV case study.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(一)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 物件導向程式語言已成為當前軟體發展主流語言，利用抽象、封裝、委任、繼承、多形等特性達成軟體設計的彈性、重複使用性等。隨著軟體規模日漸龐大，軟體工程師需更進一步具備更有效的抽象化與重覆使用設計技術，而設計樣式為當前滿足此目標主要的設計方法。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個樣式導向軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	物件導向式程式設計原理2	單元測試3	設計樣式4	樣式導向設計原理5	樣式導向設計個案研究6	樣式語言7	樣式語言個案研究8	樣式導向軟體設計專題
description.en: Object-oriented programming languages such as C++ and Java have become the main stream in modern software development. Object-orientation makes flexibility and reuse possible through its characteristics of abstraction, encapsulation, delegation, inheritance, and polymorphism. However, as the scale of software increases, software engineers need an even more powerful tool of abstraction and reuse. Design patterns have been established as the main design techniques to achieve reusable object-oriented design. This course aims to establish this core capability. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Principles of object-oriented programming 2	Unit testing3	Design patterns4	Principles of pattern-oriented design5	Case studies in pattern-oriented design6	Pattern languages7	Case studies in Pattern languages8	Term project in pattern-oriented design

notes: 2教207教室/必修二選一，重覆修習僅承認1門學分

description.zh: 現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	通訊軟體特性2	程序式程式設計3	物件式程式設計4	物件導向式程式設計5	泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)6	單元測試7	通訊軟體函式庫8	通訊軟體設計個案研9	通訊軟體設計專題
description.en: Modern communication and signal processing systems rely on the close collaboration of circuits, hardware, and software. Therefore, software design is one of the core capabilities that communication system engineers should possess. This course aims to establish this core capability using C/C++ as the working language. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Characteristics of Communication Software2	Procedure-oriented programming3	Object-based programming4	Object-oriented programming5	Generic programming using C++ Standard Template Library (STL)6	Unit testing7	Communication libraries8	Case studies in communication software design9	Term project in communication software design

notes: 資工所電資外生合/必修二選一，重覆修習僅承認1門學分

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念與技術。學生將學習開發高品質軟體相關的原理、觀念、方法、與技術。本課程將介紹下列主題：一、軟體工程簡介二、軟體流程模型三、需求工程四、軟體設計方法五、物件導向軟體開發六、軟體測試與驗證七、軟體品質確保八、軟體維護九、軟體專案管理與規劃十、軟體工程進階主題
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.An Overview of Software Engineering2.Software Process Models3.Requirements Engineering4.Software Design Methods5.Object-Oriented Software Development6.Software Testing Strategy and Tactics7.Software Quality Assurance8.Software Maintenance9.Software Project Management and Planning10.Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度進階的巨量資料探勘與應用課程，主要介紹巨量資料探勘概念和原理、分散式計算基本架構、及各種應用包括: Link Analysis、Social Network Graph Mining、推薦系統等, 並且將介紹在處理巨量資料時常用的機器學習方法, 如: 類神經網路、SVM等，除了觀念的介紹外，透過平行化程式設計的練習以及期末專題，能讓學生認識實際巨量資料探勘的程式設計以及機器學習等工具的應用方式。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts in big data mining and advanced applications in machine learning. Topics include big data concepts, distributed computing infrastructure, and machine learning methods commonly used in processing big data, such as neural networks, support vector machines. In addition to concept introduction, parallel programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the processing steps and practical tools in big data anlaytics.

notes: 資工四、資工所、資財所和電資外生班合開

name.zh: 嵌入式智慧影像分析與實境界面
name.en: Embedded Computing Systems for Intelligent Image Analytics and Interactive Systems

description.zh: 本課程主要內容為：1.嵌入式智慧計算系統、2.嵌入式影像處理技術、3.影像辨識技術、4.人工智慧辨識技術、5.實境互動界面技術，並整合實務議題之專案開發。
description.en: The course contents include: 1. Embedded Computing Systems; 2. Embedded image processing techniques; 3. Image recognition techniques; 4. Artificial intelligence techniques for image analytics; 5. AR-based interactive systems; 6. Practical Projects

notes: 資工四、資工所合開,專業融入服務學習

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC及O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括PSI指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

description.zh: 氣膠為懸浮在空氣中的微小固體或液體粒子。本課程深入探討氣膠科學（微塵學）及其工程上之應用。．氣膠理化特性，粒徑分布．氣膠運動學：擴散和布朗運動，過濾機制，荷電性質，熱泳等．光學特性及其應用．氣膠的測量原理與方法．大氣氣膠及生物氣膠
description.en: ．Indroduction:characterization of aerosols,shape and size distributions．Particle transport:Brownian motion and diffusion, centrifugation, intertia and filtration, convective diffusion,extermal forcr fields, thermal force．Optical properties:visibility, light scattering．Aerosol dynamics:coagulation, formation and growth．Atmospheric Aerosois and Bioaerosols．Measurement of aerosol

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標(UN SDGs)的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層(BOP)與創造共享價值(Creating Shared Value, CSV)之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 自動化機械簡介，規劃及設計，驅動器，感測器可程式控制，氣液壓迴路控制，電腦介面控制，自動化系統實例介紹及應用。
description.en: Introduction ， design  and  planning  for  Automatic  machine ， Actuators  sensors ， PLC ， pneumatic  control ， PC - based  control ， Examples  for  Automatic  system  and  its  application .

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

notes: 自動化所和車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

notes: 自動化所、自動外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

notes: 自動化所和機電博班合開

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹模糊邏輯、模糊推論、模糊控制及其應用。滑動模式控制、適應性控制、最佳控制、基因演算法及其相關智慧型控制方法之設計及應用也將在此課程中被探討。此外，藉由一些物理及工程的系統以驗證課程中所介紹之智慧型控制法方之可行性及有效性。
description.en: In this course, fuzzy logic, fuzzy inference, fuzzy control and its application will be introduced. In addition, sliding mode control, adaptive control, genetic algorithm and optimal control will also be explored in this course. Moreover, some engineering and physical models are used to show the feasibility and validity of these intelligent control methods.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習資料分析與處理的基本技巧，包括資料管理、資料格式轉換、資料表格建立、數據模型及視覺化處理及實例應用之探討。本課程以物件導向程式語言為基礎做為資料分析之工具，並且實作各應用實例，修習本課程之學生需具備一定之程式及數學基礎。
description.en: The course, Data Analysis and Processing, teaches the basics of data management, analysis, modeling and visualization that apply to all domains using object-oriented programming languages. Solid programming background and mathematics are required to take this course.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

notes: 電機所、自動化所、機電外生與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1.幾何光學2.波動光學3.光束光學4.傅氏光學5.光電磁學6.偏極光學與晶體光學
description.en: 1. Ray Optics2. Wave Optics3. Beam Optics4. Fourier Optics5. Electromagnetic Optics6. Polarization and Crystal Optics

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   真空工程, 直流電源, 射頻電源, 微波, 熱燈絲等各種能量方式之CVD化學氣相沉積法, PVD物理氣相沉積法, 電鍍技術,以及膜的特性觀察與實驗，包括SEM，EDX，XRD與金相顯微觀察，附著力測試等。1.光電半導體V-I特性分析試驗 2.接面型光電元件C-V量測實驗 3.光導電及少數載體存活時間量測實驗 4.邁克蓀干涉儀實驗(3)5.雷射繞射實驗(3) 6.偏振實驗(3)7.分光儀實驗(3)
description.en: The practices in vacuum engineering, variety deposition methods such as CVD, PVD and electroplating, that include DC, RF, microwave hot filament etc are be performed. Tests of film properties and its characterizations such as SEM, EDX, XRD, and metallurgical microscope are also be examined.1.Experiment on V-I characteristics of photonic devices.2.C-V measurements of optoelectronic devices.3.Measurements of photoconductivity and minority-carrier lifetime of photonic materials.4.Lab on Michelson interferometer5.Lab Experiment on diffraction 6.Lab on polarization7.Lab on spectrometer

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.晶體結構與晶體缺陷 2.光電材料的種類 3.材料的光電特性 4.發光元件 5.檢光元件 6.各種光耦合器
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and defects 2.Optoelectronic aterials3.Optoelectronic 4.Light-emitting devices 5.Properties of materials 6.Optical couplers

notes: 光電所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。  由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

name.en: Design and application of optical coating

description.zh: (1)基本理論(2)光學薄膜設計之圖示法(3)分光鏡(4)高反射鏡(5)	截止濾光片(6)帶通濾光片(7)斜向入射薄膜
description.en: (1)Basic theory (2)Admittance diagrams for optical coating design(3)Beam splitter(4)High reflection coating(5)Edge filter(6)Band-pass filter(7)Tilted coatings

description.zh: (1)晶格結構(2)液相磊晶技術(3)氣相磊晶技術(4)有機金屬氣相沉積技術(5)分子束磊晶技術(6) 磊晶層量測技術
description.en: (1) Lattice structure (2) Liquid phase epitaxy(3) Vapor phase epitaxy (4) Matel-organic chemical vapor deposition (5) Molecular beam epitaxy (6) measuring technology of epilayer

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池與太陽能光譜，2. 太陽能電池材料特性，3. 產生、結合與太陽能電池元件物理，4. 轉換效率、損失與量測，5. 矽太陽能電池技術，6. 化合物與多接面太陽能電池技術，7. 先進太陽能電池技術，8. 太陽能系統與應用。
description.en: 1 Introduction of Solar Cells and Sunlight, 2. Review of Solar Cell Material Properties, 3. Generation, Recombination, and Device Physics, 4. Conversion Efficiency Limits, Losses, and Measurement, 5. Silicon Solar Cell Technology, 6. Compound Material and Multi-Junction Solar Cell Technology, 7. Advance Solar Cells, 8. Solar Cell Systems and Applications.

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

description.zh: 1. FPD背景簡介 2.FPD製程原理 3. 偏極化: Jones 矩陣 4. 液晶顯示器的Jones矩陣模型 5.主動式液晶顯示面板設計初步
description.en: 1.Background Introduction to FPD2.Process Technology for FPD3.Polarization: Jones Matrix4.Jones Matrix Model of LCD5.AM-LCD Panel Design: Preliminary

notes: 光電四、光電所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en: The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-reflective structures (invisible cloaks), basic wave optics: double-slit interferences, single-slit diffraction, and scattering (Rayleigh Scattering, Mie Scattering).

notes: 光電三、四、所和電資外生合開，Comsol, Rsoft

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋以下幾項範圍：染色体結構,DNA複製與轉錄,蛋白質結構、功能、輸送、合成與分解、真核與原核細胞基因調控、分子發育學、跳躍基因、癌症與免疫生物學等。並引導學生探討幾個相關分子生物化學較深入的知識。包括:蛋白質接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: Lectures are concerned with number of selected topics in molecular biochemistry.: structure and coding capacity of DNA chromosomes; DNA replication; transcription, protein synthesis; protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; prokaryotic and eukaryotic regulation; metabolic and genetic regulation; transposable elements and genetic engineering; cancer and immunobiology, biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 此課程包含幾大方向： 1.	醫工簡介 2.	常用之醫學材料 甲、	金屬 乙、	高分子 丙、	陶瓷 3.	奈米技術 4.	材料測試 甲、	物理/機械測試 乙、	細胞測試
description.en: The content of the lecture includes:1.Introduction to biomedical engineering2.commonly used medical materials: metals, polymers, ceramic3.nano-technology4.materials testing: physical/mechanical tests,iocompatibility tests

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 初選人數限制15人;化工所和EOMP合開

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.

notes: 大四化工所合開;90人教室

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要(1)有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3)有機發光二極體(OLED)元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5)有機太陽能電池；(6)有機記憶體元件應用；(7)有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

notes: 大三四化工所合開,限25人

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬與合金凝固之基本理論以及它的應用與控制,由熱流動,質量傳輸以及成核與晶体成長來討論凝固機制。
description.en: The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析

description.zh: 1.合金製程簡介2.成份改變製程　a.合金熔煉-感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b.合金精煉-電弧爐、  c.電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉3.合金結構改變製程　a.凝固控製與快速凝固　　b.方向性凝固　　　　　c.熱處理控制-均質化、強化處理　　d.鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4.合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金5.未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程內容含有: (1)簡介。(2)貯氫合金種類(3)貯氫合金結構與性質(4)貯氫合金製程---機械冶金(5)貯氫合金製程---真空感應熔煉(6)貯氫材料之吸放氫測量方法(7)貯氫合金應用(8)鎳氫電池材料(9)奈米碳材之結構與性質(10)奈米碳材之製程(11)奈米碳材之應用(12)氫燃料電池---質子交換膜材料(13)氫燃料電池---膜電極組材料
description.en: The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.Classes of Hydrogen Storage Alloys (HSAs),3. Structure and Properties of HSAs,4. Production of HSAs ---Mechanical Alloying Process,5.,roduction of HSAs ---Vacuum Induction Melting (VIM) Process,6.. Method of Measuring Storage Capacity for Hydrogen Storage Materials,7. Application of HSAs,8. Materials of Nickel Hydride Battery Electrode,9. Structure and Properties of Carbon Nano Tubes (CNTs), 10. Production of CNTs, 11. Application of CNTs,12. Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Proton Exchange Membrane, 13 Hydrogen Fuel Cell ---Membrane Electrode Assembly (MEA)

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程(實務研討)，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、創新性技術對傳統的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的專利地圖與迴避設計、科技知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school  students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Innovative Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Patent Mapping and Design -Around of Research & Development, Knowledge management of Technology and Case Discussions, etc. In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: N
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is:Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization.Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing.Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing.Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position.Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation.Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 1.電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4.流量與壅塞控制 5.介質存取控制機制 6.區域網路 7.網路互連技術 8.無線網路 9.高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

notes: 資工所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程講授如何使用Westlaw International資料庫進行IP研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
description.en: This course is intended to expose students to various research skills for studying IP issues. Primarily, this course teaches how to use the Westlaw International database to do IP research. The framework of the database is based on the legal research methodology applied to American law. So, the basic knowledge of the American legal research methodology will be introduced. In addition, this course will demonstrate major patent databases to students. Students will be assgined to one research project. Students are required to study reading materials before each class. Class participation is also required.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

notes: 日職合開，共科513教室，限7人

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.en: Practice in biomedical materials/devices patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際醫材產品或相關技術，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspects of the patent prosecution in biomedical materials/devices. The topics cover patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and office action response. In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies are also discussed in class.

notes: 化工所和生化所合開,限12人

name.zh: 專利程序審查與新型專利
name.en: Patent application procedures and utility model patent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請分割、申請改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹台灣之新型專利相關之申請與審查作業。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application procedures and related regulations. In addition, utility model patent system in Taiwan is also presented.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法，培養學生撰寫論文的基本知識與能力。
description.en: This course will introduce research methods and provide students with fundamental knowledge and competence on writing thesis.

name.en: Cultural Creativity and Interactive Design Project

description.zh: 文創為因應科技與時代潮流，導入數位互動設計發展為未來趨勢。相關應用可應用於體驗經濟、博物館之人文數位導覽、媒體傳播、與數位出版。文創運用科技與創意的結合方式可創造更多的可能性與未來性。本課程透過創意設計，結合數位科技導入實務經驗傳承，朝向創新文創發展為課程的核心宗旨。
description.en: Science and technology and cultural and creative response to the trend of the times, introducing digital interactive design for the future development trend. Related applications can be applied to the experience economy, digital humanities museum tour, media, and digital publishing. Cultural and creative use of technology and innovative ways to create more combination possibilities and the future of. The course through the creative design, combined with practical experience in introducing digital technology heritage, cultural and creative development toward innovation as the core purpose of the curriculum.

description.zh: 「創意商」是指一個人在創意能力上的指數。本課程至少包括下述和「創意商」相關的課題：它的科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它的知識論基礎，如何培養創意的基因，如何區別個人的與在團體中所展現的創意，等等。本課程將進行系列的西方創意理論與個案探討，目的在使學習者得以培養他們的「創意商」。
description.en: “Creativity Quotient” refers to the quotient one has for her ability of creativity. The course covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creativity Quotient”: its scientific basis, its psychological methods, its epistemic foundation, the development of the gene of creativity, the difference between individual creativity and creativity in a group, etc. The course will proceed with a series of close surveys of western theories and accounts of creativity and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will cultivate their “creativity quotient. ”

name.zh: 文化生活美學發展專題
name.en: Seminars on the Aesthetics of Life

description.zh: 探索古代生活中重要的文化主題，尤其是恬適快意又發顯美感訊息的生活內容與活動模式，這滲透著義涵與美感的主題，歷經翻檢淘洗終被標舉揭櫫，即是本課程著意介述、體驗、評論的元素。「美學」是以對美的本質及其意義的研究為主題的科學，「文化學」研究文化現象或文化體系，「審美文化」則以其特有形態來彌補「道」、「器」間的距離，以實物印證觀念，用觀念史來概括和昇華物態。「文化生活美學」在相關的三者間另闢新徑，取材傾向生活行為方式及活動內容，探索理解與感受，結合「意義的貞定」、「美感領受的追求與實現」，以古典中國文士階層的開發為主力，擴及君王貴族及民間百姓的留存。本課程分為二部，前者宏觀文化變遷現象及其架構成因，其次，梳理古來時節風尚，人文藝術的脈絡，廣泛取材於文學、思想、器物、禮制、用香、茶藝等生活美學內容，回溯、體驗、評論，而體驗經濟模式的企劃，正是為「文化生活產業化」預做準備。
description.en: Life Aesthetics is the kernel of cultural life; it has become integral in the process toward cultural industrialization and industrial culturalization. In fact, "creative industries" may be connected to various sectors of developments and has become a prospect eagerly and aggressively pursued by visionary people, especially in the wake of Chinese economic expansion.This course will examine the important elements constituting cultural lives across different dynasties in Chinese history and investigate their patterns of presentations. The beauty of traditional behavioral culture, the significance of solar terms and seasonal festivals, and the implications of cultural concerns can serve as sources, based on which students' creativity be stimulated and further brought into full play.

description.zh: 大稻埕文創社區經營結合歷史、建築、文化、音樂、茶道、祭典與近代社會運動、歷史遺跡，組合成豐富的大稻埕文化，藉由對此社區活動的認識，結合現代文創元素，讓學子對台北的古遺跡有更深刻的認識，並打造「大稻埕」成為歷史街區活化的國際品牌，期盼在提升台灣學子的「就業即戰力」與「國際移動力」的同時，也成為當今我國文化外交戰略的重要環節。
description.en: The community management of Dadaocheng creative zone combines her own history, architecture, culture, music, tea ceremony, ceremonies and modern social movements, historical relics into a rich specific Dadaocheng culture, through propagating her community activities combined with modern creative elements.  We expect our students to improve their " employment agility" and "international mobility", by enabling them to have a deeper understanding of specific Dadaocheng culture. And then, Dadaocheng being an international brand is an important part of Taiwanese cultural diplomacy strategy.

notes: 共同科館614教室上課; 大四、碩班合開; 碩班限10人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。課程內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies. This course combines information and software tools to use; the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics including: Financial markets and financial institutions, the financial statements and cash flow analysis, financial planning and forecasting, risk and return, bond and stock pricing, the cost of capital, capital budgeting decisions, capital structure and financial leverage, working capital management, dividend policy, mergers and acquisitions, etc. This course combines b

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 請排3教教室/修課上限為35人

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限20人

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限20人

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 限本系生修課,選課人數上限20人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹互動媒體設計與製作時所需要的資訊技術與應用程式。本課程的內容包含了解目前發展互動科技應用時可使用之應用程式與系統的概念、元件及操作原理的介紹。並透過基礎元件設計的應用與實作，培養學生透過應用程式與腳本語言程式的撰寫。有別於資訊相關科系程式設計的課程，本課程將發展包含程式應用概念介紹、程式撰寫邏輯思維訓練、以及互動程式撰寫的模組，學生可依自己的興趣以及投未來生涯規劃需求，選擇不頭的學習模組，以培養未來互動科技發展所需的跨領域專業知識。另本課程也結合業界的資源與師資，協助學生深入了解未來互動科技技術與程式應用的發展趨勢。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the principles of information technologies and programming coding skills that can be used in interaction design element of the multimedia production process. Course activities are focused on programming coding skills training and the descriptions, contents, principles and applications of the changes to the digital technologies of interaction design and their future trends. This course encourages students to critically engage with interdisciplinary approaches to information technologies and interaction design in a context of peer support and feedback, in order to forge their own unique personal skills. These skills are then applied to a real-world design project in which students work with a project, with advice and input from industry professionals.

notes: 入學前為設計背景同學必選修課程/選課上限為15人

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生具備以下的能力：1. 使學生具備能夠把「抽象概念」轉換成實務設計的基本能力。2. 培養學生有美感欣賞與基本應用技巧的能力。3. 訓練學生具有獨立思考與解決問題的視覺構成能力。4. 具備認識感官資訊處理過程以及傳遞原理的基本能力。5. 能了解視覺、聽覺以及空間互動資訊如何運作以及應用的能力。6. 學習如何運用相關的方法、整合相關專業知識與技能於資訊設計上。
description.en: This course is expected to train students to be equipped with the following abilities: 1. Ability to transforming the abstract ideas into practical design. 2. Ability of aesthetic appreciation and basic application skills. 3. Visual construction ability of independent thinking and problem-solving. 4. Understanding of perceived information processing and communication principle. 5 Understanding of knowledge and application of visual, acoustic and spacial interaction information. 6. Learning how to apply relevant methods and integrate knowledge and techniques to practical information design.

notes: 排光華409,入學前為程式背景同學必選修課程/上限15人

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: 機電博.機電外生.機械自動化外生.能源車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 此課程教學目標在於幫助學生們針對未來就業市場，了解若要能有效地行銷，需具備之相關行銷概念、策略、技巧及明白行銷在公司策略中之角色定位。為因應全球國際化，課程也將特別著墨於顧客行銷與企業行銷之相似與不相似處。除此之外，還將包含行銷目標市場定位、行銷市場研究，最重要的是如何整合相關資源，作行銷策略之規劃、執行，並讓同學們擁有行銷人才需具備之相關技能。
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is: Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization. Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing. Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing. Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position. Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation. Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程藉由觀察並分析消費者的決策過程以及他們對各式產品所抱持之態度，來了解其消費行為。消費者為什麼又是如何作出他們最終的消費抉擇？在消費過程當中，他們的思考及行動是如何運作的？完成消費行為之後，他們是否對自己的決定感到滿意？在本課程中，多項與消費者行為息息相關之概念及主題將會一一於課堂中討論（如：感知及認知、人類行為、使用者經驗、人因工程、人本設計、制度規範、產品開發等等）。
description.en: This course will focus on the understanding of consumer behavior through consumers' decision-making processes as well as consumers' attitudes towards certain products. How and why do consumers make their consumption choices, how do they think and act during the processes, and do they feel satisfied or dissatisfied with their decisions? Various underlying concepts and topics will be discussed (e.g. perception and cognition, human behavior, user experience, ergonomics, human-centered design, policy and social norms, product development, etc.)

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to offer student a sound introduction of supply chain management relative issues. It includes industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice.

description.zh: 介紹VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of the definition of the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視的一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions, etc. In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies. Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection for the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.
