description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

notes: 日職建都所和設計博所合開

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、 研究的特性 二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題 三、 研究-「何故」的問題 四、 良好研究的特質 五、 研究的基本類型 六、 從事研究的技能 七、 研究倫理 八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Characteristics of research 2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions 3. Research-the "why" questions 4. Characteristics of good research 5. Basic types of research 6. The craft of doing research 7. Research ethics 8. Research design practice

name.en: The Study of Intellectual Property Crime

description.zh: 本課程主要係以「與貿易有關之智慧財產權協定(Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights，TRIPS) 」的內容為基準，分別再以比較法的觀點，探討我國專利法除罪化的問題；商標法、著作權法及營業秘密法如何以刑事罰適切保護智慧財產的課題，藉以釐清及調和違反智慧財產權的刑、民事責任。
description.en: Conducted on the basis of “Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights, TRIPS,” the course will probe into the issue of exemption of punishment among the Patent Act of Taiwan from different viewpoints of Trademark Act, Copyright Act, and Trade Secret Act. To clarify and mediate the criminal and civil liabilities originated from the violation of intellectual property right, the proper method to protect intellectual property with criminal punishment will be further discussed.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 從綜合材料來分析當代藝術表現的造形方式，介紹各個成型技法與造形的相互關係，使學生理解材料與造形表現上的關連。經由實際專題發想及協助製作的過程，提高學生在多種媒材成型應用上的操作能力，以及造形上量感與結構性造形的創造力。課程同時安排訪問藝術家、相互合作、主動蒐集資料與產出呈現的方式，促使學生主動學習並相互關心他人作品與自身的關係
description.en: From the materials to analyze the shape of contemporary art expression, introduce the relationship between each technique, so that students would understand the relationship between materials and making processes. Through the practical project, students' ability to operate in a variety of media forming applications, as well as the creativity of volume and structural shapes. The course also arranges studio visiting, mutual cooperation, collection of materials and exhibition, prompting students to actively learn and care about the relationship between art and human.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

notes: 日碩&外生班&設計博合開,上限15人

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視的一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions, etc. In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies. Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection for the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

name.en: Assessment for Green Energy Generation Interconnected on Grid

description.zh: 1. 再生能源論述, 2.電力系統計算機軟體簡介, 3.電力潮流分析, 4.電力系統穩定度分析, 5.電網系統故障診斷, 6.綠能併網衝擊.
description.en: 1. Discussion on Renewable Energy, 2. Introduction to Power System Analysis Software, 3. Power Flow Analysis, 4. Power System Stability Analysis, 5. Fault Diagnosis for Power Grids, 6. Grid-Connection Impact of Green-Energy Generation.

notes: 大四和電機所合開,限30人

name.zh: 社群媒體與對話機器人系統設計
name.en: Social Media and Chatbot System Design

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生掌握社群媒體API介接技術，並能運用軟體工程方法，設計對話機器人(Conversational Bot)系統，應用於客服、零售、金融與製造等領域。課程內容包括下列模組：Line及WeChat社群訊息接口，對話訊息格式，Google Dialogflow及IBM Watson Assistant 對話流程開發平台，API流量與安全管理平台，GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)雲端系統開發框架。藉由程式實作及期末專題設計，引導學生掌握人工智慧語意分析技術，整合後台知識庫與大數據，進而設計對話機器人應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design intelligent conversational bot application systems using Line Messaging API and WeChat Open Platform.  Course spans a variety of technologies such as natural language understanding tools, Google Dialogflow, IBM Watson Assistant, API management framework, GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services to design and manage conversation flows for intelligent customer service systems.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in intelligent conversational bot system design.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

notes: 能源所、車輛所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。
description.en: I.                  General Introduction to SpectroscopyII.                 Group Theory III.               Absorption Spectroscopies --- UV-Vis, IR, Raman IV.               X-ray crystallography V.                 Bonding models in inorganic chemistryVI.               The structure and reactivity of moleculesVII.                    solid state

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對電力電子與其相關應用進行探討，內容著重於電能轉換技術、現代化科技與新世代產品之結合。課程主題如下: (1)電能處理簡介 (2)基本電力轉換器(3)回授控制器設計(4)太陽能電池特性(5)最大功率追蹤技術(6)電池特性與充放電技術(7)逆變器電路與技術(8)再生能源發電系統(9)電動車驅動系統
description.en: This course focuses on the Power Electronic technologies and related applications. The combination of the electrical energy conversion techniques, modern technologies and next generation products will be included. Main topics of this course are as follows: (1) Introduction of Electrical Energy Processing (2) Basic Power Converters(3) Feedback Controller Design(4) Solar Cell Characteristics (5) Maximum Power Point Tracking(6) Battery Characteristics and Charging/Discharging Technologies(7) Inverter Circuits and Technologies(8) Renewable Energy Generation System(9) Driving System of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 排光華409,創新所、互動所和互動外生班合開,上限9人

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性. 本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程.
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probabaility and random processes. It includes probability measures,random variables,law of large number,random processes and stationaryprocesses.The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.zh: 1.微波傳輸線2.微波元件3.微波材料4.微波量測5.微波傳輸轉換6.微波耦合7.微波濾波器8.微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1.寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3.多使用者偵測4.MIMO 5.時空傳輸技術 6.標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 「企業領導力」是企業經營管理中非常重要元素和指標。我們將由學術理論和商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討企業領導力的管理策略; 並著重於企業價值創新，以培育高教學生具有全球商業開發和經營管理的領導技能。
description.en: The course, Corporate leadership, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, theories and experiences for the development of business leadership practice and to achieve the corporate value creation. In the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world, the Corporate Leadership role is not just the corporate internal management concerning but also needs a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge and strategic thinking on business development, communication skills with innovative ideas, and management techniques for the long-term business goals. We will expand the scope and scale of the research related, review articles, complete class projects, and discuss real business cases.

description.zh: 本課程為ㄧ跨文化、跨領域及跨國界的實務導向課程。課程結構涵蓋二個主軸：(1)透過分組討論議題與任務指派，學習團隊合作，從領導力到團隊成員之間的溝通，確認每個成員的角色定位，建立高績效團隊；(2)透過宏觀的金融分析以及時事的案例研討，判斷國際市場趨勢，並透過市場上真實的投資工具模擬，逐步帶領學生從基本面、技術面進行國際市場的行情分析以及個人的風險控管。
description.en: This course is a practical international Economic course.There are two main parts of the lecture.The first one is team building, you will learn how to divide the work and communicate effectively.The second part is learning by doing. The teacher will analysis the trend of the international market by macroeconomics. Moreover, teaching students using technical and fundamental analysis to predict the market. Most important of all, let students use the online application to imitate the real trading world.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎2.影像的轉換3.影像的加強4.影像的復原5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮7.影像的分割與特徵抽取8.影像的表達及描述9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals.2.Image transforms.3.Image enhancement.4.Image restoration.5.Color image processing.6.Image compression.7.Image segmentation and feature detection.8.Representation and desciption.9.Recogmition and interpretation.10.Applications:ALV navigaton and medical image.

notes: 電子所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以微波電路組件與平面型天線為兩大主軸，深入介紹各個議題如何分析、設計、製作與量測，並著重於它在新一代無線通訊系統中扮演的角色與應用。中文概述1.微帶線電路特性2.共面波導電路特性3.共面帶線電路特性4.各式傳輸線結構之轉接5.新式平面型電路組件6.高頻電路量測技術7.微帶天線設計8.寬頻天線設計9.天線陣列設計10.天線參數量測
description.en: 1.Characteristics of Microstrip Line Circuits2.Characteristics of Coplanar Waveguide Circuits3.Characteristics of Coplanar Stripline Circuits4.Transitions for Different Transmission Line Structures5.Novel Planar Circuit Components6.Techniques of High-Frequency Circuit Measurement7.Microstrip Antenna Design8.Broadband Antenna Design9.Planar Antenna Array Design10.Techniques of Antenna Parameters Measurement

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 機電博、機電外生與製科所合開，限博士生修習，限15人

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系統。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹基於神經網路的深度學習技術及其在商情預測上之應用， 主要內容包括：（1）深度學習和神經網路的基本概念和演算法；（2）深度學習的主流結構、啟動函數及正則化技術；（3）電腦視覺與自然語言處理技術應用案例；（4）深度學習主流結構的商情預測應用。通過課程的學習，同學們可瞭解神經網路基本概念；掌握深度學習中主要網路結構的基本概念和相關演算法；瞭解具體應用領域的背景知識；應用相關深度學習技術於商情預測。
description.en: This course will give a full picture of deep learning techniques and its application in business forecasting. Content includes: (1) basic concepts and algorithms of deep learning and neural networks; (2) popular network structures, activation functions, and regularization techniques; (3) principle and applications of computer vision and natural language processing. (4) applications of popular network structures in business forecasting. By learning this course, students will consolidate the basic concepts of neural networks; master the basic concepts and related algorithms of the main network structure in deep learning; understand the background knowledge of deep learning techniques with specific application fields; and understanding how to apply the main network structure in business forecasting.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6)7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools                     2.The basic optical systems3.Basic optical devices            4.Seidel aberrations5.Image evaluation               6.The design of optical systems7.The use of Zemax              8.Project on optical design

notes: Zemax軟體,光電所和電資外生合開

name.en: The Study of Intellectual Property Crime

description.zh: 本課程主要係以「與貿易有關之智慧財產權協定(Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights，TRIPS) 」的內容為基準，分別再以比較法的觀點，探討我國專利法除罪化的問題；商標法、著作權法及營業秘密法如何以刑事罰適切保護智慧財產的課題，藉以釐清及調和違反智慧財產權的刑、民事責任。
description.en: Conducted on the basis of “Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights, TRIPS,” the course will probe into the issue of exemption of punishment among the Patent Act of Taiwan from different viewpoints of Trademark Act, Copyright Act, and Trade Secret Act. To clarify and mediate the criminal and civil liabilities originated from the violation of intellectual property right, the proper method to protect intellectual property with criminal punishment will be further discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹數據分析的基本及進階的概念和技術，以及如何將它們應用於大規模數據集。主要是在回顧描述性統計，概率分佈，推理統計（估計和假設檢驗）和回歸分析，機器學習技術(PCA、ICA)、判別分析、聚類分析、SVM、隨機森林、人工神經網絡、DTW、EMD。此外，本課程將使用流行且功能強大的數據分析語言(即R)來解決許多實際問題。
description.en: This course covers the basic and advanced concepts and techniques of data analytics and how to apply them to large-scale data sets. Mainly, after a review of descriptive statistics, probability distributions, inferential statistics (estimation and hypothesis tests), and regression analysis, various machine learning techniques such as PCA, ICA, discriminant analysis, cluster analysis, SVM, random forest, artificial neural network, DTW, EMD will be dealt. Also, this course will show you how to use the popular and powerful data analysis language, that is, R, to solve many practical problems based on use cases extracted from real domains.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 1.熱力學精簡複習2.有機朗肯循環的介紹3.有機朗肯循環與蒸汽朗肯循環的差異4.工作流體的選擇與系統效率5.熱源與熱沉6.系統元件的設計 7.有機朗肯循環的應用8.系統最佳化探討9.為落後地區人們所設計的有機朗肯循環10.與全球暖化、碳稅等議題有關之議題探討
description.en: 1. Brief review of Thermodynamics 2. Introduction of ORC 3. Difference from steam Rankine cycle 4. Selection in working fluid & System efficiency 5. Heat source and heat sink 6. System components design 7. ORC application 8. System optimization 9. ORC for undeveloped territories 10. Related to the issues of global warming, carbon tax, etc.

notes: 機電所、能源所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開,1週【停開】

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

notes: 機電所、能源所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

notes: 製科所.機電外生.機械自動化.車輛外生合開，限20人

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計2. 電晶體電路分析與設計3. FET電路分析與設計4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償5. 功率放大器分析與設計6. 回授放大器分析與設計7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計8. 震盪器分析與設計9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

name.zh: 心理物理學與信號偵測理論

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
description.en: The goal of the course is to empower students in learning the scientific approach of psychophysics, the relation between physical stimuli and human sensations and perceptions, applying the method of signal detection theory. Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

notes: 日職合開/排進修部教室/上限為30人

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.en: Research to the strategy of product development

description.zh: 以新產品開發為主軸，介紹市場環境特質、組織特質，對新產品開發過程中新產品概念的產生以及技術建構方式等的影響，涵蓋開發過程中工業設計與其他功能領域間的互動關係，及設計管理；對新產品開發績效與企業目標達成的影響。
description.en: Introducing the impacts of the characteristics of the market and the organization on the concept development of new products as well as the related technologies adopted  in the development process. The interaction among the Industrial design department and other functional departments and the influences of design management to (1) the performance of new product development and (2) the accomplishment of the organizational goals are also studied.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F教室

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 本課程探討現今積體電路製程相關議題，並討論解決方法與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深包含製程模組如：晶圓製備、氧化、黃光微影、擴散、蝕刻、薄膜沉積、後段製程等，並深入探討為因應元件持續微縮而提出之先進製程整合技術。學生可了解半導體產業的應用，以作為進入半導體、光電、感測器等相關產業的先備知識。
description.en: This course will introduce the semiconductor processing, including device basics, process flow, manufacturing, and process integration. The students will gain a thorough overview on semiconductor manufacturing technology before working in industry.

Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

description.en: 1. Concepts of concrete structures and concrete material properties, 2. Loads and material strength required for designing supporting structures, 3. Seismic design of offshore wind turbines, 4. Wind resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 5. Wave resistance design of offshore wind turbines, 6. Fatigue design of supporting structures, 7. Case studies of steel structure design for supporting structures, 8. Case studies of concrete structure design for supporting structures, 9. Footing design of offshore wind turbines

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 大四和研究所合開,限20人

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

name.zh: 眾所必讀的經典故事1: 喬瑟與莎
name.en: Classic Stories Everybody Should Know 1: Chaucer and Shakespeare

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家—喬瑟及莎士比亞—作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to central thematic and cultural ideas in the major writers of the early modern period, Chaucer and Shakespeare. Read closely by the major writers of later periods, these works are the foundation of modern English literature and western thought. They also provide essential background knowledge for any graduate study of western culture in general.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開,9/23停開,1週【停開】

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

notes: 管理博班和職經管所合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.zh: 材料科學、光電技術及關鍵專利
name.en: Material Science, Electro-Optical Technology, and Essential Patents

description.zh: 本課程主題將集中於材料、光電技術與該些技術之關鍵專利檢索、布局策略研討，學生除了可學習材料科學與光電科技的基礎知識外，亦可瞭解到專利如何運用在這些相關產業上，課程內容包括: (1)材料科學原理，(2)材料科技產業介紹，(3)材料產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析、(4)光電工程技術、(5)光電科技產業分析、(6)光電產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析。
description.en: The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1) material science principle, (2) material technology industry analysis, (3) material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5) electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.

notes: 智財所與光電所合開，限7人

name.zh: 智慧財產權海外深度研習
name.en: An In-Depth Overseas Study for Intellectual Property

description.zh: 本課程只提供給欲參與每年暑假，由日本大阪工業大學智慧財產學院舉辦之夏季智慧財產權密集課程的學生來選修。而本課程之內容，以準備夏季課程中之英語簡報比賽為主，並以每年暑假為本課程之上課時間。至於本課程開設之目的，乃以增強學生實際應用英語之能力，並以加強學生國際智慧財產權之知能為主，除了強化本所與日本大阪工業大學智慧財產學院之學術交流關係外，更能夠擴展參與學生之國際人脈及視野。
description.en: This course is only provided for students to enroll, and they decide to participate summer intellectual property intensive course held by the School of Intellectual Property, Osaka Institute of Technology. Moreover, contents of this course are focused on preparing English presentation contest held in the summer intensive course, and time of this course is in the periods of each summer vacation. In addition, purposes of this course are mainly to promote students’ English abilities in practices and students’ knowledge of intellectual property. This course not only enhances relations of academic exchanges between our institute and the School of Intellectual Property, Osaka Institute of Technology, but also broaden attended students’ international relations and visions.

notes: 限今年8月有去日本OIT參加課程的學生選修(日職合開)

description.zh: 本課程講授次世代記憶－儲存媒體之軟硬體技術、記憶體架構、存取特性、以及管理策略。此外，本課程亦將討論不同記憶－儲存系統，如檔案系統、資料庫、NoSQL資料庫、Key/Value儲存、內容感知儲存、近似儲存等之架構與設計，以及記憶體中運算等創新之關鍵技術。請注意本課程以全英語授課，並採用全英語教材。
description.en: This course introduces the hardware/software technologies, architecture, access characteristics, and management strategies of next-generation memory/storage media. In addition, we shall also cover the architecture and design issues of various memory–storage systems, such as file systems, databases, NoSQL databases, key–value store, content-aware storage, and approximate storage. The key technologies such as processing-in-memory (PIM) are also discussed. Please note that this course is given in full English, and adopts full-English materials.

notes: 電子所和電資外生合開

description.zh: 本課程為沿續統計學課程，探討論文寫作所需統計分析理論與方法。課程內容含: 一因子與二因子變異數分析、實驗設計、多元迴歸分析、因素分析、集群分析、區別分析與結構方程式等。1.	Introduction to SPSS2.	Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)3.	Experimental Design4.	Nonparametric Test5.	Multiple Regression6.	Factor Analysis7.	Cluster Analysis8.	Discriminant Analysis9.	Structural Equation Model (SEM)
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course including ANOVA, Experimental Design, Nonparametric Test, Multiple Regression, Factor Analysis, Cluster Analysis, Discriminant Analysis and Structural Equation Model (SEM).

description.zh: 1. 體認永續在設計之重要性 2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用 3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳 4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
description.en: This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.

notes: 工設三四與日碩合開；人數上限20人

notes: 建築四與建都所合開賴啟健

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析(malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1.數值方法介紹2.能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器3.能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道model、氣體擴散層model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

notes: 能源所、車輛所、能源車輛外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一，機電甲8選2

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，製科所必選課程之一，限30人

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職場自我行銷」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、以及職場生涯規劃等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 本課程集中上課(10:00-13:00)，如無法配合勿選

description.zh: 本課程在介紹並討論衡量系統可靠度常用的機率模式、串連系統、並連系統及混合式系統的可靠度特性及其評估方式。此外也介紹評估實際系統時常用的統計方法及資料蒐集和推論的技巧，最後討論可修護系統的可靠度衡量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to construct the structure fuhction of a system and to culculate its reliability.some probability models and probability distributions that are commonly used for lifetime representations will be introduced.series system,parallel system,and the conlination of both will be thorouqhly diseerssed in respect of their reliability characteristics. The statistical mefthods related to data colleetion and inference that are useful when evaluating the reliability of real-life systems will also be mentioned. Finally,we will introduce the concept of repairabie systems and related probability models.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

name.en: Integration of the actual situation for intelligent factory

description.zh: 工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，傳統建廠模式無法確保建廠完工後能順利運作，工業4.0智能工廠建廠模式分成3D工廠規劃設計、虛擬智能工廠建模、虛擬智能工廠虛實整合、實體工廠建置四步驟，透過虛擬智能工廠與雲端資料庫資訊的虛實整合後，才能確保智能工廠建置完成後可以順利運作。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. The traditional factory building technique cannot be used in an intelligent factory. Building an industry 4.0 intelligent factory follows 4 steps: 3D planning and design of factory, modeling of virtual intelligent factory, integration of the actual situation for virtual intelligent factory, and build of the real factory. Integration of the virtual intelligent factory with cloud database information is required for working of the intelligent factory.

notes: 機械大四和機電所合開

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
