description.zh: 介紹如何開發『資料庫』的應用軟體以結合機械工程應用。內容含：Ubuntu Linux電腦作業系統，Apache伺服，MySQL資料庫伺服，HTML與PHP電腦程式語言，範例剖析。
description.en: The course aims to introduce the applications of database, further to combine them with the applications of mechanical engineering. The introduced contents consist of the following points:1.Ubuntu Linux, 2.Apache Server, 3.MySQL Server, 4.HTML and PHP, 5.Examples Explainations.

name.en: Sampling and Analysis of Environmental Pollution

description.zh: 本課程以講授環境污染物之檢測分析為主,且偏重近代之精密儀器分析,使學生瞭解微量物性污染物之採樣品管及分析原理,此課程內容包括:1.概論2.檢測與分析之基本原理3.儀器分析導論4.半揮發性有機物之採樣與分析5.揮發性有機物之採樣與析析6.重金屬採樣與分析7.品管方法
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course,Sampling and Analysis on Environmental pollutants,focuses on microquantity pollutants.Contents of the course includes:Concept of sampling and analysis,Theorectical background.Principle of instrument analysis.Sampling and analysis for semi-volatile organics,aavolatile organics,and heavy metals.

notes: 防災所和環境所合開,9/25停開,1週【停開】

name.en: Architectural themes in the contemporary city

description.zh: 本課程將檢視一系列以近10-20年為主之當代建築與都市議題。在經濟社會文化與構體型態相互交織影響下的當代城市中，建築，又或建築議題本身則可視為一種反照或批判都市變遷結果下的凝聚。雖建築與都市學門在西方知識體系下已有豐富且多樣的累積傳承，然而，在千禧年代後，相對更加複雜且未定性的社會空間現象，迸發出許多前所未有的空間議題與研究視角，進而使學界不斷提出新興理論和概念以描繪與分析其變化。因此， 本課程主要透過閱讀當代幾種關鍵的社會空間狀態與理論，以進理解並討論建築與都市如何反應，再塑，甚至協同工業，後工業與全球化影響下之議題。基於此，本課程著重內部與跨學門之連結，期待透過論點互相參照如對話的方式，將多向度的空間切入點，帶入當代城市中的建築與都市討論。除理論文本外，課程中也將以議題聚焦，探討東西方現代城市的特殊意表與其相較性。期習者能建立具有提問，方法且深度理解性的批判能力，以為重新思考近代建築，都市與景觀論述的他樣可能性。
description.en: The course examines a range of debates in contemporary architectural and urban themes, focusing on the last 10-20 years. Architecture as the interaction between built forms and economic, social and cultural contexts may take various modes ranging from reflection on and critique of the consequence of urban transformation. Drawing from key movements, and theories, this course will primarily articulate the varying roles that architecture has played in confronting, shaping, or even celebrating the e?ects of industrialization, post--industrialization, and globalization. In addition, the course will be strongly concerned with intra- and inter-disciplinary linkages, looking at “conversation” within the discipline and at relevant debates in related spatial disciplines. It aim to furnish students with a set of questions, methods, and understandings for criticism and self-critique which shall destabilize and re-think recent architectural, urban, and landscape discourse.

notes: 建都所和設計博班合開

name.en: Special Topics on Spatial Analysis and Design

description.zh: 本堂課主要在於從全球化與在地化的角度探討當代建築與都市設計中的重要理論、案例與關鍵課題，尤其藉由回溯其自二十世紀初以來的發展歷史，本課程將聚焦於一系列具有代表性的建築師與設計作品，透過他們在建築與都市設計上的專業實踐來反思當代人類社會所面臨的各種挑戰與機會。具體本課程將透過案例討論與分析的方式來進行，所有學生將對於指定案例進行獨立研究，並應用課堂所教授之方法與工具對於該案例進行理論與空間構成的分析性評論，最終再彙整成一份完整的評述報告。案例分析的內容將需要包括以下四個重點：一、時空背景如何對於建築與都市設計之實踐造成影響？二、空間生產的過程與結果如何回應真實社會的需求？三、如何從空間構成的角度反思設計之於空間的意義與價值？四、該案例如何影響未來建築與都市設計之發展趨勢？在分析工具的部分，本課程針對建築與都市設計兩種不同的尺度將分別著重於兩種不同面向的分析：在建築尺度的案例上主要的重點在於空間的組織性，實際操作則是以距離、深度與視野等不同元素的比較分析為主；在都市設計尺度的案例上重點則在於空間的序列性，透過軸線、區段與使用分析對於都市型態的轉變與演化提出反思。
description.en: The course aims to analyze contemporary ideas, ideologies, and projects of architecture and urban design in the context of both globalization and specific local contexts. By tracing the development back to the early 20th century, the work and thinking of influential architects will be examined in terms of their reflection on current challenges in our profession and society. The main content of this course will be delivered through case study. In specific, all students are expected to make analytic comments on assigned cases by applying tools taught in class. Four interrelated issues are to be focused: 1. Context of professional practice; 2. Production of space in relation to social demands; 3. Reflection on spatial configuration; and 4. Influence on future trends.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹各種光學方法，用以量測位移及角度之變化，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號，以便進行分析。其內容含 :            ．簡介                ．雙頻干涉儀        ．幾何誤差            ．光學尺        ．幾何光學法          ．雷射光學尺        ．干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target . Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

name.zh: 材料科學、光電技術及關鍵專利
name.en: Material Science, Electro-Optical Technology, and Essential Patents

description.zh: 本課程主題將集中於材料、光電技術與該些技術之關鍵專利檢索、布局策略研討，學生除了可學習材料科學與光電科技的基礎知識外，亦可瞭解到專利如何運用在這些相關產業上，課程內容包括: (1)材料科學原理，(2)材料科技產業介紹，(3)材料產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析、(4)光電工程技術、(5)光電科技產業分析、(6)光電產業關鍵專利檢索與布局分析。
description.en: The objective of this course will focus on materials science principle, electro-optical technology and their related essential patents portfolio analysis. The content of the course includes: (1)material science principle, (2)material technology industry analysis, (3)material technology essential patents, (4) electro-optical technology, (5)electro-optical industry analysis, (6) electro-optical industry essential patents.

notes: 光電所與智財所合開,限7人

name.en: Application of Fiber Optical Broadband Network

description.zh: 以光纖取代傳統銅纜，可避免干擾，傳輸品質佳。且傳輸服務不中斷，網路架構簡單。此外高速FTTB線路具有客戶頻寬管理功能，可依客戶需求提供更彈性、更高頻寬(至1Gbps)。FTTB提供高速上網外，可提供企業VPN、都會網路、校園專案及互動式多媒體(MOD)等多樣寬頻服務。
description.en: Using fiber optics to replace coaxial cable, the method could avoid interference and achieve high-quality of transmission as well as no interrupting transmission services and simple network architectures. Besides, high-speed FTTB have management functionality of customer broadband, which can provide requirements of more flexibility and high bandwidth to customers. FTTB could offer Business VPN, Metropolitan Area Network, school project, MOD, and various broadband services...etc.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

notes: 製科所必選課程之一；製科所和機電科博合開

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 機電所、能源所和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，乃為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but also maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resources will bring adverse results. The topic will include: fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 生質能源(bioenergy)指的是儲存在現有(活著或剛失去生命)的動植物體的能量。生質能源的來源，主要是植物將太陽能經由光合作用轉換成葡萄糖，在進一步合生物高分子衍生物(如多醣體(polysaccharides)) 。新一代生質能源技術強調環保技術，整合跨領域之技術，包含應用分子生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖、醱酵控制及生物觸媒技術-利用生物酵素進行催化化學反應達成環保及高效率與節能之目的。本課程將介紹動植物的多醣體種類及如何運用新興生物系統學的技術開發生質能源。
description.en: Bioenergy is referred to the energy stored in living or recently living biological organisms, such as animals, plants and microbes. The source of bioenergy can be traced back from plants harvesting the sunlight and converting it to glucose, then to other biopolymers such as polysaccharides. The technologies for developing bioenergy, with an emphasis on environmentally compatible, consist of gene cloning technology from molecular biology and enzymatic control and catalytic chemistry (i.e. green chemistry).  The course is an introduction course on the types of polysaccharides in animals and plants, how scientist use system biology to develop bioengergy.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所、化工所、生化所和EOMP合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 本課程分為上下學期，介紹如何將金融操作方式，以明確演算法去定義、描述，進而用R語言、XQ、或MultiChart去模擬、執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、交易策略研發、回測系統、資金管理。此外，本課程邀請創富創投團隊與嘉實資訊擔任業師課程指導。創富創投董事長 張智超 先生為國內知名冠軍操盤人，曾在富邦與國票證卷10年賺逾過20億。其團隊開授課程主題如下：基本面研究、產業面連結、交易面訓練、操盤面實戰。嘉實資訊為國內最大財金資訊軟體公司，其業師將帶領同學接觸XQ交易系統，撰寫XS語法。
description.en: This course is divided into two semesters. It introduces how to use financial operations to define and describe clearly the algorithm, and then uses R language, XQ, or MultiChart to simulate and execute. Contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, backtesting, and fund management.. In additions, this course invites the Chuang Fu Venture Capital Team and  SysJust company to serve as a professional mentor. Mr. Zhang Zhichao, chairman of Chuangfu Venture Capital, is a well-known trader and has earned more than 2 billion NTD in Fubon and Waterland Securities in 10 years. The theme of the courses offered by the team is as follows: Fundamental research, industrial connection, trading surface training, practical trading, and actual operation of company funds. SysJust company is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. Its industry lecturer will lead students to contact the XQ trading system and write XS grammar for financial tradin

description.zh: 本課程主要是在於介紹一些駭客常用的攻擊方法和可能使用工具，並藉由這些技術的解說讓學生瞭解實際駭客的攻擊行為與思維模式，進而習得如何保護所管理的網路或資訊系統免於被攻擊成功。課程中將輔以實機操作，教導您如何利用現有電腦資源掃描及測試系統的安全問題，藉以保護系統安全，課程中將加強實際的上機操作，藉由上課所模擬的網路環境中，讓同學能夠實際感受攻擊的可能實況
description.en: This course is mainly to introduce network and system attack methods and security assessment tools used by hackers, and to explain the attack behavior and thinking strategy of hackers through the explanation of these technologies. In addition, this course teaches students learn how to protect the managed network or information system to against from being compromised successfully. The course will be supplemented by practices, and teaching students how to use the existing tools to scan and test the security of the system. In order to protect the security of the system, the course will focus on the system and network practices, which can let the students feel the possible network and system attacks.

notes: 科研240/三四甲碩合開,限10人

description.zh: 來自於內部與外部的攻擊使企業在系統及網路保護遭遇許多挑戰，為了有效控制企業風險，政府在內部控制相關法規明確要求資訊系統相關的內部控制，而電腦稽核為確保內部控制的關鍵角色。本課程內容以國際電腦稽核師(CISA)認證的各項領域內容為主。期望學生能夠對於瞭解資訊系統稽核及其風險管理相關概念有初步的瞭解，進而瞭解資訊安全及資訊系統稽核的機制與手法，作為協助學生順利考取國際電腦稽核師(CISA)認證碁石。
description.en: Internal and external attacks have caused enterprises to encounter many challenges in system and network protection. In order to effectively control enterprise risks, the government's accounting regulations explicitly require information system-related internal controls, and computer audit is a key role for ensuring internal control. The content of this course is based on the content of various fields of the International Computer Auditor (CISA) certification. Students are expected to have a preliminary understanding of the information system audit and its risk management related concepts, and then understand the mechanisms and techniques of information security and information system auditing. Finally, it is expected as a way to help students successfully obtain the CISA certification.

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度進階的巨量資料探勘與應用課程，主要介紹巨量資料探勘概念和原理、分散式計算基本架構、及各種應用包括: Link Analysis、Social Network Graph Mining、推薦系統等, 並且將介紹在處理巨量資料時常用的機器學習方法, 如: 類神經網路、SVM等，除了觀念的介紹外，透過平行化程式設計的練習以及期末專題，能讓學生認識實際巨量資料探勘的程式設計以及機器學習等工具的應用方式。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts in big data mining and advanced applications in machine learning. Topics include big data concepts, distributed computing infrastructure, and machine learning methods commonly used in processing big data, such as neural networks, support vector machines. In addition to concept introduction, parallel programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the processing steps and practical tools in big data anlaytics.

notes: 資工四、資工所、資財所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 廣告策略與企畫為廣告之進階課程,學生需結合行銷,廣告,創意,消費者心理及行為等領域之知識,並具備優秀之企畫能力,為所指定之企業,產品或理念規畫完整之整合行銷傳播企畫案。
description.en: nternational Advertising and Media Strategy takes a market-oriented approach to the total campaign. The course interrelates planning, creative and technical skills with emphasis on problem-solving and marketing communications.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有86%有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出(MIMO)傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下:1.無線通道模型2.多樣性3.通道容量4.MIMO I: 空間多工5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構6.MIMO III:多樣性與多工間取捨7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

notes: 電機所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 生醫製造是新穎的工程領域，是跨基礎科學與工程製造領域的實用科技，本課程專注於生醫製造方法的需求規範、製造原理的解說以及相關的新興領域的應用。在技術方面，生醫製造技術涉及積層製造技術、生物噴印技術、生醫材料、支架結構設計、細胞培養和動物實驗等相關知識。此課程也會說明斷層掃描影像重建人體模型的流程，支架內部孔隙設計對強度的影響，生物列印機的組裝技巧與規範，FDA對生物列印的規範，人工肉品的細胞培養與製造；另外，在應用於藥物開發方面，生醫製造學目前在再生醫學，藥物和組織工程等領域的應用案例說明，以及未來趨勢的分析與討論。
description.en: Biofabrication is a practical guide to the novel, inherently cross-disciplinary scientific field that focuses on biomanufacturing processes and a related range of emerging technologies. These processes and technologies ultimately further the development of products that may involve living (cells and/or tissues) and nonliving (bio-supportive proteins, scaffolds) components. The course introduces students to cell printing, patterning, assembling, 3D scaffold fabrication, cell/tissue-on-chips as a coherent micro-/nano-fabrication toolkit. Real-world examples illustrate how to apply biofabrication techniques in areas such as regenerative medicine, pharmaceuticals and tissue engineering.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限15人

description.zh: 生醫製造是新穎的工程領域，是跨基礎科學與工程製造領域的實用科技，本課程專注於生醫製造方法的需求規範、製造原理的解說以及相關的新興領域的應用。在技術方面，生醫製造技術涉及積層製造技術、生物噴印技術、生醫材料、支架結構設計、細胞培養和動物實驗等相關知識。此課程也會說明斷層掃描影像重建人體模型的流程，支架內部孔隙設計對強度的影響，生物列印機的組裝技巧與規範，FDA對生物列印的規範，人工肉品的細胞培養與製造；另外，在應用於藥物開發方面，生醫製造學目前在再生醫學，藥物和組織工程等領域的應用案例說明，以及未來趨勢的分析與討論。

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

name.zh: 資料探勘技術與產業大數據應用
name.en: Data Mining Techniques and Industrial Big Data Applications

description.zh: 本課程第一階段乃詳述資料探勘技術之原理與應用案例，包含分類、估計、預測、關聯分組、同質分組等範疇。第二階段乃敘述大數據理論、技術、與實務，包含製造業、零售業、服務業等應用實例。
description.en: This class will first help students familiarize themselves with the data mining techniques, including classification, estimation, prediction, affinity grouping, clustering, among others. In the second part, the big data analytics will be introduced and its potential applications in the manufacturing, retail and service industries will be investigated.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

description.zh: 近年來企業為面對市場競爭的挑戰與快速改變，其經營管理活動多以專案方式來執行，以致企業各部門工作皆與專案管理息息相關，如：產品研發、行銷規劃、生產製造、教育訓練及企業經營管理等活動，多以專案方式來執行。 本課程將對於企業內全方位專案管理流程做一概述，並安排企業實例做為案例探討。課程針對研發、採購、行銷及行政專案管理等之五大流程 (起案、規劃、執行、監控、結案)及十大知識領域 (整合、範圍、時間、成本、品質、人資、溝通、風險、採購、關係人) 與各流程中所使用的技能與工具做說明與介紹。此課程之內容包含全面專案管理觀念知識的建立與應用，並著重企業全方位的相關專案實務案例講解。使其瞭解專案管理在產業界重要性，企業研究發展的正確方向，以達產學合一，並分享最新觀念與實務。
description.en: Recently, facing the marketing challenges and rapid changes, the company's business management activities are mostly carried out in a project-based manner, all departments are closely related to project management and carried out on a case-by-case basis. This course will provide an overview of the full-scale project management process within the company, and arrange enterprise practice as a case study. The course covers five major processes and ten areas of knowledge (integration, scope, time, cost, quality, human resources, communication, risk, procurement). The content of this course is based on the concept knowledge and focuses on the company's comprehensive (product R&D, marketing planning, manufacturing, and training program) case study. To make attendants understand the importance of project management in the industry to achieve the unity of production and learning, and to share the newest concepts and practices.

name.zh: 社區營造與地方創生專題
name.en: Specific Topics on Community Empowerment and Placemaking

description.zh: 全球面臨高齡化、少子化、人口過度集中大都市與城鄉發展失衡問題，包含台灣在內的許多國家紛紛提倡社區營造，鼓勵社區居民積極參與地方公共事務，以激發「故鄉之愛」凝聚社區共識，進而號召居民共同經營社區生活。如何擬定政策、透過什麼鼓勵與參與機制，是社區營造必需面對的挑戰。地方創生是立基於既有社區營造的經驗，找尋每一個地方的獨有特色，以培養自身適合的產業為目標，推動企業返鄉投資、導入科技、?聚公私部門資源、鼓勵社會參與及建立品牌。從而能改善地方的生活空間與創造地方生機，減緩地方人口的外流，逐步吸引湧往都市的青年回流，以均衡地方發展。本課程將介紹社區營造與地方創生關聯的理論與實務，國內外案例的理念、策略、行動與啟發，進而檢視自身的社區，討論如何創造地方安穩的工作環境？如何創造企業地方據點以吸引人才回流？如何滿足年輕世代穩定經濟支援的生涯規劃？如何創造?居與樂活的生活環境？
description.en: Aging, fertility decline, highly populated urban areas, and unbalanced development are global issues. Community Empowerment has been advocating encouraging local people actively involved in public affairs. How to formulate policies and what incentives adopted are challenges for communities. Based on the experience of community empowerment, Place-making is looking for place's unique natures, aiming at cultivating industries, promoting investment in returning home, introducing technology, pooling resources of all sectors, encouraging social participation and building brands. It can improve living space, create vitality, slow down outward migration, and attract the youth returning home. This course will introduce theories and practices, and strategies, actions, implications of the cases, explore the way of creating stable platform, attract talents, and meet the youth career planning and living environment.

description.zh: 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，產生大量的數據，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究與討論議題。本課程內容將介紹大數據的概念、應用與分析方法，包括如何處理與儲存大數據以及選擇有關大數據分析之應用服務與實例個案於課堂上簡報與研討。
description.en: With the widespread use of cloud computing services and the development of Internet services, huge amount of data has been generated. How to deal with the huge amount of data has become a hot research issue. This course   introduces the concept of Big Data as well as discusses the applications and analysis methods. It also includes how to handle and store huge amount of data and how to carry out further exploration from big data. Big data case studies and practices will also be conducted in the class.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避免與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

name.zh: 結合行動網路之無人戴具通訊技術
name.en: Integrating Unmanned Aerial Vehicle in Mobile Networks

description.zh: 本課程將講解無人戴具產業發展趨勢，介紹無人戴具通訊系統與網路以及滯空無人戴具裝載無線基地台之空中基地台應用的挑戰，並藉由空對地通道特性與通訊技術應用於無人機的實驗，了解無人載具通訊網路的最佳部署，課程內容包含：(1) 無人戴具系統簡介; (2) 無人飛行載具之點對點傳輸技術-軟體無線電實作; (3) 無人戴具空中基站; (4) 無人戴具通訊系統的性能分析-空對地通道特性與模型; (5) 無人載具與地面站之OFDM傳輸; (6) 無人戴具通訊網路的最佳部署
description.en: This course introduces the development trend of the unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) industry and explains the challenges of UAV communications and networks. With the experiment using air-to-ground channel characteristics, the software-defined radio-based experiment is designed for the transmission of UAVs and ground stations. The course includes: (1) introduction of UAV; (2) point-to-point transmission of UAV based on software-defined radio; (3) performance analysis of UAV systems - air-to-ground channel characteristics and models; (5) OFDM transmission of UAVs and ground stations; (6) optimal network deployment for UAV

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

notes: 六教；和經管三、經管所合開；限15人

name.zh: 創業講座—創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 9/18起上課6週,三ABC節;9/18務必出席;經管三和所合開

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(四)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 第1~2週需發表創業Idea;和經管三、經管所合開；10人

description.zh: 本課程將教授組織工程技術之基本原理及其應用。課程內容包括幹細胞技術、細胞與組織之物理化學性質、細胞之生長曲線與特性、細胞與組織培養、基因轉殖、細胞與組織分離技術、細胞支架之生醫材料、組織工程產品之檢測，以及組織工程產品上市流程等。
description.en: This course will illustrate the basic principles and applications of tissue engineering technologies. The content is consists of stem cell technologies, properties of cells and tissues, cellular-fate process, cell and tissue culture, gene transfer, cell and tissue separation, biomaterials for scaffold, testing of tissue engineered medical products (TEMPs), and the commercialization process for TEMPs.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：?車牌與門牌數字辨識?人臉辨識?1000種影像分類?辨識9000種物件  ?自動駕駛模擬?嵌入式深度學習演算法?空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:?遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人?對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人?深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

notes: 須修過工程數學或線性代數;電子三四、所,電資外生合開

name.en: Science Technology Innovation And Foresight Thinking

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model andrelated theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生(1)增進解決複雜設計問題的專業知識，(2)提升發展創新營運模式的企劃能力與(3)建立當前科技、經濟與社會文化等變遷下的前瞻設計意識。本課程融合相關理論與實務，透過未來劇本工作坊與校外專業者分享經驗，提供學生全方位的產品服務系統設計體驗。
description.en: The course is to help students develop an awareness of the implications of current technological, economical and socio-cultural changes to design professional discipline by expanding their expertise for solving complex problems and sharpening their planning capability for business modeling in creative and systematic ways. Integrating theories and design related to Product-Service System, the course provides the students with a comprehensive experience of designing a product and a service in scenario design workshops. Lectures from external professionals will be invited to share their experience with the students.

description.zh: 進階職場專業英文針對本校碩博士生設計系列最後一哩之實務專業課程。課程內容以英語全球溝通為主軸，強化商業寫作、簡報、會議及談判等技巧及能力。
description.en: The course provides essential and pragmatic English language used in real workplace. As it is designed for postgraduate students, the course also takes into account students’ academic studies as well as centers on students’ future career prospects. Students are expected to practice and refine their English communication skills, in particular correspondence writing and speaking. In that vein, students will be required to compose business correspondence, such as letters, emails and memos, and also to perform in simulated meetings and to brief progress report in English.

description.zh: 1.輪胎模型 2.輪胎性能參數 3.穩態操控 4.暫態操控 5.四輪操控 6.乘坐舒適性分析
description.en: To provide an overview of ground vehicle handling and ride performance through the development, analysis and interpretation of vehicle models.  The course is divided into three major parts: Tire modeling, Handling, and Ride.  For each part, case study examples will be used to illustrate the important design considerations.

name.zh: 智能車輛技術與產業案例研究
name.en: Investigation of the Smart Green Vehicle Technologies and their Industrial Case Studies

description.zh: 智慧新能源(智能)車輛技術與產業案例研究課程有；技術面之科技趨勢與現況，產業面之產品與國際鏈結及競爭。技術面一，以車輛與環境智慧化如何面對新經濟挑戰為布局，情境創新、商業模式創新、到車聯網科技創新。技術面二，以新能源車輛技術發展如何面對新能源法規挑戰為布局，由純電池動力、複合動力系統、到燃料電池動力系統。此課程另一重點為公司產業海外鏈結與國際競爭之案例研析，其中有自駕車之系統與零組件公司，及新能源車輛動力之系統與零組件公司。公司產業海外鏈結與國際競爭之案例研析，包括公司產品與服務、核心競爭定位、技術內涵、市場與海外鏈結、未來科技與產品或服務布局、人才需求，藉此案例分析讓學生多了解產業發展與自我生涯規劃方向，也有機會在畢業前與產業對話，或布局產學合作與實習機會。
description.en: The class will start from the introduction of the smart green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, smart system and green powertrain technologies, and their case studies of the Industrial oversea-connectivity including the innovation of scenario-based applications, value chain integration from the system development, key component supply to market promotion. The lectures will also to be delivered by the industrial experts from the intended case-study companies, and to cover their core competence of the products and services, technology road map, talent capacity building, and the future needs of the new talent. The dialogue of the industry and student will broaden the student views from domestic to global automotive status.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資料探勘的技術、方法與應用，並以人本資訊處理為主要範例，進行說明，以奠定人本資訊的基礎。課程內容涵蓋人本資訊的特性、資料前處理、資料維度的縮減、屬性/因子/特徵選取、資料關聯、分類與分群技術等。並將應用實際人本資訊資料做為分析案例，探討資料探勘在人本資訊的應用。
description.en: Human-Centered Information and Data Mining is the introductory course of data mining techniques and their applications in human-centered information processing. This course will cover the basic characteristics of human-centered information, data preprocessing, dimension reduction, feature selection, data association, classification, and clustering techniques. Using human-centered information as example cases for data mining, we will investigate the applications of data mining in human-centered information.

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和GPS資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

notes: 化工大四和化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

name.zh: 國際產業跨域PBL專題實作

description.zh: 本課程旨為引導學生建立能夠因應全球化環境所需之能力。透過企業命題之專題導向(PBL)模式，與產業合作共同設計符合國內產業需求之主題，並依主題安排對應領域之教授群及邀請產業代表共同授課，督導學生進行分組進行符合產業趨勢及需求的專題實作。學生在學期末將報告專題實作成果，由企業及授課教授共同評量。此課程也同時邀請來自各國來本校的交換生共同上課，訓練跨文化及語言之溝通力與合作力。
description.en: This course is specifically designed for facilitating the students’ global competence building. The curriculum utilizes the needs of domestic industry and arrange the counter-disciplinary faculty members across departments to teach and supervise under the framework of problem-based learning (PBL) model. The course participants include the domestic students and international exchange students across the world, so they can practice how to work together across cultures.
